page.title: 11Pastimes in Hemsworth
page.content: {A Survey of Children's Hobbies} We surveyed eighty children aged between eight and nine years of age. The eight to nine year olds didn't have many studious hobbies.Only one of those surveyed played a musical instrument! This was an organ. We found that many children had more than one hobby. Boys seemed to do more energetic things such as football and judo, while a lot of girls go to clubs like Brownies and dancing classes. A lot of children aged between thirteen and fourteen years played ball games or went to discos. Again, none of them did studious things. Not one played a musical instrument. Since many of our friends play musical instruments we realise our survey was not large enough to be accurate.
